Name: The Phoenix
About the game: The Phoenix is a classic 2D action-platformer. This game is inspired by Capcom's Mega Man games from the late 1980s and early 1990s, with 8-bit art, a soundtrack inspired by chiptune music, and simple yet challenging gameplay. Play as the Phoenix as you traverse 5 difficult levels, fight through hordes of henchmen, and fight powerful supervillains in an attempt to save the city from an evil mob boss!
Meta Title: The Phoenix: Jan 31, 2022, Grant G Heffner and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Phoenix? Check out the release date (Jan 31, 2022), developer insights from Grant G Heffner, and a complete game summary.
